channel.title: How to? easyrsc
channel.description:
4 things then im done askin questions for while :D
1:I have edited the smelting xp its good but when i smith a item it still seems like to much xp is given but looked and you can't make diffrent xp for when smithing an item how would i lower it?
2:Blahhh MakeOverMage has correct pointer, and also has the npchandler.java also the npc coords are in correct positions why won't it work?
3:I'm sure everyones aware that charge spell won't work on easyrsc umm any way possible to fix that?
4:What would be a good dedi for this, and what are risk if you were to run server without dedi?
Thanks,

item.title: How to? easyrsc
item.dc:creator: @skarletdeath skarletdeath
item.description:
@skarletdeath wrote:

i’d rather run it off a dedi for ddos protection thx for info ( = what would be a good dedi running with easy rsc ddos protection is a must.

item.title: How to? easyrsc
item.dc:creator: @RSCShadow RSCShadow
item.description:
@RSCShadow wrote:

[quote=“skarletdeath, post:3, topic:329864”]whats risk of running dedi off your own pc without dedi though?

and if anyone could help with makeovermage be appreciative.[/quote]lmao, do you even know what dedi means? It’s not dedicated if it’s on your internet.

item.title: How to? easyrsc
item.dc:creator: @snoopy89 snoopy89
item.description:
@snoopy89 wrote:

1 = formulae,
2 = The mage doesn’t go after coords as he is scripted. (if you compare him to “shops”) with the little info you gave for it I can’t help you.

3 = use the search bottom altought it sucks now when they updated moparFourm.

4 = do what you want.
